Game.Name: SD Valis (Japan)
Game.plot: Syd of Valis is an Action game, developed by I.S.C. and published by Laser Soft,which was released in Japan in 1992.Cheat: Get Rid of MusicTo get rid of the music, simultaneously press B and Start at the title screen. You have to reinput the code each time you lose a life.Cheat: Get Rid of MusicEnter the following code at the Title screen.... Up - Down - Left - Right - A - B - Up - Down Then when you play the game you will be invincible
